page.description: The EMAIL_SELECT_PROFILE() function opens a dialog box with a list of all profiles and allows the user to select one. The dialog also has an option to set the selected profile as the active profile.

argument.name: profile
argument.description: The default profile selection to show to the user. Character

return.name: Selected_Profile_Name
return.description: The profile that the user selected. Returns NULL if none is selected.
